updated_cases.title: Create Private App with DLP Profile+Allow Action for BA traffic and DO HTTP Upload and validate the NSProxy is processing it and sends to DLP and validate the policy is getting hit.
updated_cases.custom_preconds: Features: clientlessNpa and npa_support_dlp should be enabled
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- User should be to create RTP policy with these parameters
            - Access method: Browser Access
            - Destination: Private app, and select Browser Access based APP for HTTP/HTTPS
            - Activity: Upload
            - profile: DLP Profile(any)
            - action: Allow
- Validate the policy is synced to proxy in ns_custom_apps.json file.
- Send Https traffic to match policy conditions. and traffic should be successful
- Skope-it Alert should be create for matching policy for Upload activity
